definition[0]: to kill an animal, especially for its meat
definition[1]: to kill a lot of people in a cruel or violent way
example[0]: Hundreds of innocent civilians had been slaughtered by government troops.
definition[2]: to defeat an opponent in a sport or game by a large number of points
definition[3]: when people kill animals, especially for their meat
example[2]: the export of live animals for slaughter
definition[4]: when large numbers of people are killed in a cruel or violent way
example[3]: the slaughter of defenceless women and children
